titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide a grant for the construction of a statue of Harry S Truman at Union Station in Kansas City, Missouri.
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide a grant for the construction of a statue of Harry S Truman at Union Station in Kansas City, Missouri.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 108-225.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide a grant of up to $50,000 to pay the Federal share of the costs for the construction of a statue of Harry S Truman at Union Station in Kansas City, Missouri.
